channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump administration says it will exclude some electronics from reciprocal tariffs
item.description: The Trump administration says it will exclude electronics like smartphones and laptops from reciprocal tariffs, a move that could help keep the prices down for popular consumer electronics that aren’t usually made in the U.S.

item.title: Judge relaxes ban on DOGE access to sensitive US Treasury information
Lawyers for Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs want jurors at trial questioned about sex, drugs and violence
